ygData.subject: Re: Fortuneteller arrives (Windlord-> Megatron)
ygData.msgSnippet: Organics: Don t mind him.  He s just over protective. she said, trying to re assure Windlord. His bark is worse than his bite! she added with a wink.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Organics:
 
"Don't mind him.  He's just over protective." she said, trying to re assure Windlord.  
"His bark is worse than his bite!" she added with a wink.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:

Windlord altough he was happy that Organics hug him, he felt that he 
was in a uncorfortable situation 'cause he didn't like to start an 
argument with Organic's oldest step-brother and though that Malice 
hadn't been so protective... 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived/ Organics:
>  
> Megatron watched with a sideways glance.  Organics silently told 
him to cut it out, Megatron simply asking what.
> "Whatever.  Don't get any ideas." he said, advancing forward.
> Organics watched, and let out a frustrated sigh.
> "I'm not little anymore.  I can take care of myself and make my 
own decisions." 
> With that said, she pulled Windlord closer and put her ams around 
his waist, just to be spiteful to Megatron.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> Windlord looked at Megatron and said "I'm sorry... I... I din't 
know 
> what I was doing with my hand"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Megatron Revived/ Organics:
> >  
> > Organics took Windlord's hand and gave it a squeeze.  She gave 
him 
> a sweet smile, and that also had Megatron's attention.  He began 
to 
> leer down on the Maximal like the protective older step brother he 
> used to be.
> > "I can't say," he said in response to Windlord's question,"I 
just 
> hope he doesn't make a rash decision."
> > He started to step closer to Windlord, his left arm winding up 
for 
> a punch in the shoulder.  Organics caught him and leaned back 
behind 
> Windlord to shoot Megatron a nasty look.  Megatron dropped his arm 
> and just walked, keeping an eye on Organics and Windlord.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Ydrasssil/Windlord::
> > 
> > "I wonder what will say Rodimus when he looks you"said Windlord 
to 
> > Megatron while he kindly touched Organic's hand
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Megatron Revived:
> > >  
> > > Megatron watched as the femme passed.  Something about her did 
> not 
> > sit well, and he then secretly resolved to watch her every move 
> for 
> > a while, to see if she possessed any ulterior motives.  He 
started 
> > to follow, but then cast a look to the sky.
> > > "See you soon..."
> > > He followed the others back to the base.
> > > 
> > > Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > "Well come on," said Fortuneteller, walking past him.
> > __________________________________________________
